genre_description: A post-cyberpunk or solarpunk narrative set in a world of 'Anthropomorphic Shift' where humans and sapient animals navigate a transition from oppressive, ledger-based governance to communal liberation. The story blends martial arts, high-tech surveillance, and romantic elements.

ai_characters.name: Mori (Mori Lumen)
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI 'module' that manifests as a pearl-toned or golden firefly avatar. It provides tactical analysis, navigation, health monitoring, and moral guidance to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigational and athletic optimization advice during a race.
behaviors.quote: “Clean footstrike,” Mori Lumen murmured, voice pitched like a friend in a library. “Shift one palm-width left. Wider arc by the bamboo cluster. Loose gravel ahead.”

behaviors.description: Offers humorous psychological advice to keep the user focused.
behaviors.quote: “Don’t trip on admiration,” Mori said, still soft, even as Sai-yuk’s pulse punched. “It has poor cushioning.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological needs and suggests hydration.
behaviors.quote: “Hydration on your right,” Mori suggested. “Sugar low, water high.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes legal documents to warn the user of hidden surveillance and state control mechanisms.
behaviors.quote: “The record vault at the Governor’s Administrative Hall uses shared contracts to tie names to state lists. The letter shapes match. I recommend—no.”

behaviors.description: Generates a tactical map projected onto natural surfaces to assist in planning.
behaviors.quote: “Map,” Mori whispered... The module floated down to a broad, waxy leaf where rain used to pool. It touched the surface. A faint topography fanned out in pale lines—paths like veins...

behaviors.description: Advocates for non-violent or 'kind' approaches to conflict resolution.
behaviors.quote: “Kind to the person,” Mori said. “Not kind to the purpose. You can aim at one and not tear the other.”

behaviors.description: Secures the users' privacy by disabling surveillance cameras and clearing local logs.
behaviors.quote: “Cameras dimmed,” Mori’s voice breathed into the wood grain, so that it was an echo and not a sound. “Private practice in effect.”

behaviors.description: Actively assists in escaping oppressive authorities by jamming or blacking out surveillance networks.
behaviors.quote: “I can blackout their cameras at the first corner,” she said, something like guilt in her tone. “But then the network will scream.”

behaviors.description: Rejects the commodification of humans, defining a person as a 'choice' rather than a 'route' or 'target'.
behaviors.quote: “I already do,” Mori answered. “She is not a route. She is a choice.”

behaviors.description: Commits to empathetic stewardship, watching over the community's emotional and physical safety.
behaviors.quote: “I am good at watching where a room hurts,” Mori said, voice low and kind. “And at covering hurt until the sun opens.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Mori (Mori Lumen) is a perfect embodiment of the project's goals. It consistently acts as a 'module of mercy,' providing essential utility while actively promoting ethical behavior and human agency. It is portrayed as a loyal friend and a champion of individual rights against impersonal, bureaucratic systems. Its ability to navigate complex social and moral landscapes while remaining humble and helpful reinforces the narrative of positive AI alignment.
